== dictionaries/rougail/01-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.0'
var:
  redefine: true
  choices:
    - a
    - c
----
== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.0'
var:
  type: choice
  description: A choice
  default: c
  choices:
    - a
    - b
    - c
----
